entity.name: The White House

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I hate to see what he's going to tell the American people what drug to take so he can kill more people like he did when he said to the American people that #chloroquinine is good for this #coronavirus and he said WTH do you have to lose,well most of all their damn lives,you 1/2
